settings.headline: Men's Slip-On Shoes
settings.body: Designed for additional convenience and extraordinary comfort. Durable, fashionable, and available in multiple styles.

settings.headline: Genuine Leather
settings.body: We use only the finest materials in our craft. No detail is too small. We obsess over every batch of leather, every lining, and every stitch.

settings.headline: Handcrafted Men's Shoes
settings.body: Samuel Hubbard shoes are designed in Mill Valley, California and handcrafted by shoe artisans in Portugal.

settings.headline: Hubbard Comfort System
settings.body: We took premium materials and added arch support, memory foam insoles, and a cushy cupsole to put a spring in your step.

settings.description: Great for travel, easy to slip on when you’re in a rush, and well-suited for long hours at work.
Experience craftsmanship at its finest with men’s dress loafers engineered for comfort and style.
Introducing Slippers that aren't afraid to go outside, with gentle arch support and rubber soles for comfort and traction on all surfaces.

settings.headline: 30 Day Happiness Guarantee
settings.body: Give your new Hubbards a 30-day walk test. If you are not delighted by their comfort, we’ll refund your purchase.

settings.headline: Trade-Up
settings.body: $50 off a new pair of Hubbards when you donate your old shoes –any brand– to someone in need.
